slider.title: How it spreads?
slider.description: COVID-19, also referred as "Coronavirus". The virus is thought to spread mainly from person-to-person between people who are in close contact with one another.

slider.title: Clean your hands often
slider.description: Wash your hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds especially after you have been in a public place, or after blowing your nose, coughing, or sneezing

slider.title: Avoid close contact
slider.description: Put distance between yourself and other people if COVID-19 is spreading in your community. This is especially important for people who are at higher risk of getting very sick.
